overview:
Started Lovell Developments in 2004, primarily a software house and now is involved in several startup companies.

Confessional - Startup - Still early days. Clownhouse - Company iOS applications are created through for business and play. LetUsPlay - Brand for gaming on iOS LWoD - iOS applications Programming Jobs - Recruitment for Programmers Pay for Help - Startup involved in paying for local services smecrm - Hosted CRM Business for small / medium sized companies

The company started with .Net roots and more recently embarked on several iOS applications / companies.

Based in the UK, 4 staff (3 developers, 1 sales)
